T02D3486:132b-1: badzra t'a r'a s'a dha nam /
T02D3486:132b-3: rdo rje sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs //
T02D3486:132b-4: rdo rje sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3486:132b-5: sbyin sreg las kyi cho ga yis //
T02D3486:132b-6: 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed pa'i //
T02D3486:132b-7: rdo rje sgrol ma sgrub pa'i thabs //
T02D3486:132b-8: de nas yang dag bshad par bya //
T02D3486:132b-9: de la sngags kyi tshig ni 'di rnams su 'gyur te /
T02D3486:132b-10: na ma a'ary'a ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
T02D3486:132b-13: ma h'a ka ru ni k'a ya /
T02D3486:132b-15: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re sarba dusht'am pra
T02D3486:132b-16: dusht'am ma ma kri te dzambha ya stam bha ya
T02D3486:132b-20: sarba dusht'am stam bha ni t'a re sv'a h'a /
T02D3486:132b-21: ma mo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i //
T02D3486:132b-22: lha mo sgrol ma bsgom par bya //
T02D3486:132b-23: phyag brgyad zhal bzhi dang ldan pa /
T02D3486:132b-24: rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa yi //
T02D3486:132b-25: gser gyi mdog can bsgom bya ste //
T02D3486:132b-26: gzhon nu ma yi mtshan ldan brjod //
T02D3486:132b-27: rdo rje nyi mas dbang bskur skyes //
T02D3486:132b-28: sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan che //
T02D3486:132b-29: lang tsho gzhon zhid [*zhing?] yid du 'ong //
T02D3486:132b-30: gser gyi rna rgyan g-yo ba can //
T02D3486:132b-31: 'od zer dmar pos rnam brgyan cing //
T02D3486:132b-32: sna tshogs padma'i gdan la bzhugs //
T02D3486:132b-33: rdo rje zhags pa de bzhin dung ;
T02D3486:132b-34: / mda' rnams bsnams pa g-yas kyi phyag / rdo rje lcags kyu autpal gzhu //
T02D3486:132b-35: sdigs mdzub rnams ni g-yon gyi phyag / rdo rje skyil krung rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D3486:132b-36: sa gsum po ni bsgrub par bya //
T02D3486:132b-37: mdun du me tog sgrol ma ni //
T02D3486:132b-38: dkar mo shin tu yid 'ong ma //
T02D3486:133a-2: me tog phreng ba phyag na bsnams //
T02D3486:133a-3: zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis ma ste //
T02D3486:133a-4: rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan //
T02D3486:133a-5: lho phyogs bdug spos sgrol ma ni //
T02D3486:133a-6: gzugs mdzes sku mdog nag mo ste //
T02D3486:133a-7: bdug spos snod ni phyag na bsnams //
T02D3486:133a-8: rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan //
T02D3486:133a-9: nub phyogs mar me'i sgrol ma ni //
T02D3486:133a-10: rgyal chen sku mdog ser mo ste //
T02D3486:133a-11: gser gyi rna cha g-yo ba can //
T02D3486:133a-12: phyag na mar me'i sdong bu bsnams //
T02D3486:133a-13: byang phyogs dri yi sgrol ma ni //
T02D3486:133a-14: dri yi dung chos phyag na bsnams //
T02D3486:133a-15: lha mo sku mdog dmar 'bar ma //
T02D3486:133a-16: snying po'i dkyil 'khor gsal bsgom bya //
T02D3486:133a-17: lcags kyu la sogs dbye ba yis //
T02D3486:133a-18: de nas sgo skyong bsgom par bya //
T02D3486:133a-19: shar sgor rdo rje lcags kyu ma //
T02D3486:133a-20: zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ste //
T02D3486:133a-21: sku mdog nag mo bzhin mdzes ma //
T02D3486:133a-22: rdo rje lcags kyu autpal phyag / lho sgor rdo rje zhags pa ma /
T02D3486:133a-23: sku mdog ser mo bzhin 'jigs ma //
T02D3486:133a-24: zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ste //
T02D3486:133a-25: phyag na rdo rje zhags pa bsnams //
T02D3486:133a-26: nub sgor rdo rje lcags sgrog ma //
T02D3486:133a-27: zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ste //
T02D3486:133a-28: sku mdog dmar mo bzhin 'jigs ma //
T02D3486:133a-29: rdo rje lcags sgrog phyag na bsnams //
T02D3486:133a-30: byang sgor rdo rje dril bu ma //
T02D3486:133a-31: zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ste //
T02D3486:133a-32: sku mdog dkar mo bzhin 'jigs ma //
T02D3486:133a-33: phyag na rdo rje dril bu bsnams//
T02D3486:133a-34: 'di rnams g-yas brkyang zhabs kyis bzhugs //
T02D3486:133a-35: nyi ma'i gdan la nyi 'od bzhin //
T02D3486:133a-37: sprul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par blta //
T02D3486:133a-38: steng du gtsug gtor rnam rgyal ma //
T02D3486:133a-39: 'og tu gnod mdzes ma nyid bsgom //
T02D3486:133a-40: 'khor lo sprul gyi zhags bsgoms nas //
T02D3486:133a-41: sngags ni 'phro zhing bzlas par bya ;
T02D3486:133a-42: / aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re sv'a h'a /
T02D3486:133a-43: yi ge bcu yis lha mo bcu //
T02D3486:133a-44: pha rol phyin pa bcu la brten //
T02D3486:133a-45: bsgom pa rab tu sbyor ba yis //
T02D3486:133a-46: don rnams thams cad rab tu 'grub //
T02D3486:133a-47: sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag mdzad pa'i //
T02D3486:133a-48: sngags mchog 'di ni gtso bo ste //
T02D3486:133a-50: myur du rdo rje'i gur bsgoms nas//
T02D3486:133a-51: sngags 'dis gos kyi snal lan bdun mngon par bsngags byas nas //
T02D3486:133a-52: mdud pa byas na 'jigs bcas gang du 'gro yang 'jigs mi 'gyur //
T02D3486:133a-53: stag dang chom po chu srin seng ge glang chen ma he sprul //
T02D3486:133a-54: dom dang dred sogs rnams la ming dran tsam gyis 'jigs med 'gyur //
T02D3486:133b-0: sngags 'dis autpal la brgya rtsa brgyad @133b sbyin sreg
T02D3486:133b-1: byas na gang 'dod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro
T02D3486:133b-2: // aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re aa mu
T02D3486:133b-3: ki me ba sha ma n'a ya sv'a h'a zhes
T02D3486:133b-4: // so // de bzhin du sngags 'dis bya rog
T02D3486:133b-5: gi sgro la lan sum cu rtsa gnyis bzlas te
T02D3486:133b-6: khang par spas na zhag bdun gyis skrod par 'gyur
T02D3486:133b-7: // so // ro // aom t'a re tutt'a re
T02D3486:133b-8: tu re tsa la pra tsa la sh'i ghram g'a
T02D3486:133b-9: mi ni de ba dattam autstsha ta ya h'um h'um
T02D3486:133b-10: // so // ro // phat / de nas gzhan yang rab tu sbyor bar 'gyur te /
T02D3486:133b-11: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re aa mu ka
T02D3486:133b-12: aa bhi dh'a n'am ku m'a r'i ma hyam byi
T02D3486:133b-13: b'a he na ty'a:pi t'a pra yatstsha tu sv'a h'a
T02D3486:133b-14: / myos byed gtum po'i sa bon dang //
T02D3486:133b-15: de bzhin myos byed 'bras bu dang //
T02D3486:133b-16: mya ngan med pa'i me tog bcas //
T02D3486:133b-17: sbyin sreg stong phrag lnga byas te /
T02D3486:133b-18: mar dang sbrang rtsi bu ram gyi //
T02D3486:133b-19: sbyin sreg bu mo bsgrub la bsngags ;
T02D3486:133b-20: / de ni zhag bdun sbyor ba yis //
T02D3486:133b-22: de nas gzhan la yang rab tu sbyor bar 'gyur te /
T02D3486:133b-23: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re aa mu ka
T02D3486:133b-24: aa bhi dh'a n'am svasth'a na te a'a karsha ya
T02D3486:133b-25: ma m'anti ke dza:sngags 'di rgya shug gi tsher ma
T02D3486:133b-26: la stong phrag lnga lnga bzlas shing rang byung gi
T02D3486:133b-27: me tog la bsnyugs shing sbyin sreg byas na 'dis
T02D3486:133b-28: rgyal po'i bu mo yang 'gugs par byed do //
T02D3486:133b-29: de nas gzhan yang rab tu sbyor bar 'gyur te /
T02D3486:133b-30: rang byung gi me tog gis bskus pa'i ras la
T02D3486:133b-31: bcom ldan 'das ma zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa lcags
T02D3486:133b-32: kyu dang autpa la'i zhags pa bsnams pa bris la
T02D3486:133b-34: lha rdzas me tog dam pa 'di //
T02D3486:133b-35: zhes pa la sogs pas mchod pa byas la phyi nas bsgom pa dad ldan pas bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D3486:133b-36: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re aa mu ki
T02D3486:133b-37: ma ma ae pa tsi tam svam pna ka th'a
T02D3486:133b-38: ya h'um phat / stong phrag lngas 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3486:133b-39: zhags pas ske bcings te lcags kyus phug nas bsgrub
T02D3486:133b-40: bya rkang pa'i mthil du bsams te bran mo'i gzugs
T02D3486:133b-42: / de nas gzhan yang rab tu sbyor bar 'gyur te /
T02D3486:133b-43: sgrol ma'i gzungs lan bdun mngon par bsngags te bdag
T02D3486:133b-44: nyid kyi mig gnyis la byugs nas rgyal po'i rigs
T02D3486:133b-45: kyi nang du zhugs na de nas rgyal po dang
T02D3486:133b-46: bcas pa slob mar gyur pas gus par byed par
T02D3486:133b-47: 'gyur ro // 'gal bar smra bar mi 'gyur ro //
T02D3486:133b-49: dga' ba'i gtam byed par 'gyur ro //
T02D3486:133b-51: khro ba yang dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02D3486:133b-52: mthong ba'i rkyen du yang dag par 'gyur ro //
T02D3486:133b-53: de nas gzhan la yang sbyor bar 'gyur te /
T02D3486:134a-0: sgrol ma'i gzungs lan brgya bzlas nas sprul gdong gnyis pa'i mgo thal bar @134a * //
T02D3486:134a-2: ba dmar mo'i mar la aarka'i ba la la sdong
T02D3486:134a-3: bu byas te rab tu sbar nas mig sman byas
T02D3486:134a-4: te / de'i mig sman dang rdo rje nyi ma
T02D3486:134a-5: dang rdo rje chos dag mnyes shing rta mchog gis
T02D3486:134a-6: te / bdug par bya'o // thal ba dang lhan
T02D3486:134a-7: cig mig sman byas nas gang la rdo rje'i mig
T02D3486:134a-8: gis bltas pa de'i gal de padma gar dbang 'dzag
T02D3486:134a-9: par ma gyur na de'i tshe sgro la ma bdag
T02D3486:134a-10: gis bcom ldan 'das nges par bslus pa yin no
T02D3486:134a-11: te / bdug par bya'o // // de nas gzhan la yang rab tu sbyor bar 'gyur te /
T02D3486:134a-12: so ma skyes pa'i bu chung gi kha chub blangs
T02D3486:134a-13: nas sgrol ma'i gzungs lan bdun mngon par bsngags te
T02D3486:134a-14: / bhring ga r'a dza'i rtsa ba dang /
T02D3486:134a-15: gi wang dang lhan cig tu byas nas dpral bar
T02D3486:134a-16: thig le byas na gang dang gang la bltas pa
T02D3486:134a-17: de dang de dbang du 'gyur te gzhan la dga'
T02D3486:134a-19: gzhan la mi 'gro zhing rang spong bar mi 'gyur ro //
T02D3486:134a-20: de nas gzhan la yang rab tu sbyor bar 'gyur te /
T02D3486:134a-21: lto ba'i srin bu la sgrol ma'i gzungs lan bdun
T02D3486:134a-22: mngon par bsngags te rdo rje chos dang bcas te
T02D3486:134a-23: so rtsi gzhon nu ma la byin nas des longs
T02D3486:134a-24: spyad na sbyor ba'i mchog 'di mi spong zhing gzhan
T02D3486:134a-26: gzhan la mi 'gro bar rang gi bdag po yang spong bar mi byed do //
T02D3486:134a-27: de nas gzhan la yang rab tu sbyor bar 'gyur te /
T02D3486:134a-28: zhag chen po rang gi lus la byugs te /
T02D3486:134a-29: sgrol ma'i gzungs khri phrag gcig bzlas te bsgom pa
T02D3486:134a-30: dang ldan pas bzlas pa'i mthar 'bras s'a lu'i zan
T02D3486:134a-31: gyi dril phyis byas pa'i dri ma bsdus te gang
T02D3486:134a-32: la byin pa de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gtong
T02D3486:134a-34: de nas gzhan la yang rab tu sbyor bar 'gyur te /
T02D3486:134a-35: zla ba gzas zin pa'i dus su sgrol ma'i gzungs bzlas shing bsnyen pa byas la /
T02D3486:134a-36: de las byung ba'i 'jig rten dbang phyug blangs la dung gi phye mar sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D3486:134a-37: de gang la byin pa de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro //
T02D3486:134a-38: de nas gzhan la yang rab tu sbyor bar 'gyur te /
T02D3486:134a-39: sgrol ma'i gzungs myos byed kyi 'bras bu la lan
T02D3486:134a-40: brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas te 'bras bu de
T02D3486:134a-41: rta mgrin dang lhan cig tu byas nas byugs na
T02D3486:134a-43: de nas gzhan du yang rab tu sbyor bar 'gyur te /
T02D3486:134a-44: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re che ge mo'i bandha na muktim ku ru:sv'a h'a /
T02D3486:134a-45: sngags 'dis aarka'i lo ma la bsgrub bya'i ming bar
T02D3486:134b-0: du bcug ste yang dag par @134b bris nas srin
T02D3486:134b-1: bu sdig pa'i tshad du sngags na bcings pa las
